title.bibl: La Parola dei Socialisti, Aug. 21, 1915. The Victorious Strike of the Cigar-Makers.

div.bibl: La Parola dei Socialisti, Aug. 21, 1915. THE VICTORIOUS STRIKE OF THE CIGAR-MAKERS.

body.p: The Progressive Union of Cigar-Makers is justly proud of its fine victory over the Congress Cigar Company,located at Racine and Van Buren streets.
Not only was the Union able to prevent the threatened reduction in wages, but it has also obtained improvements in various departments of the company.
This victory is highly significant in the eyes of the cigar-makers because it is known that the strike was instigated by the Cigar Manufacturers' Association.
